LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_XLZ.title: <color=#87b4ff>Hedonist</color>
LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_XLZ.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] thought [PAWN_pronoun] deserved to enjoy what forefathers had left them, [PAWN_pronoun] never goes to work, will spend most of the time to develop their own abilities and self-cultivation.[PAWN_pronoun] thinks that "DFFerian" was invincible. \n\nAfter the foxes stumbled upon a wormhole that led to an unknown galaxy. [PAWN_nameDef] decided to see the strange world.
LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_FXZ.title: <color=#87b4ff>Life Sharer</color>
LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_FXZ.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef]enjoys a quiet life in the peaceful edge of the galaxy preserve. And [PAWN_pronoun] will share the daily happenings of the reserve with the entire galaxy on a public channel. 
*It's been a big hit with the locals~ UwU 

After the foxes stumbled upon a wormhole that led to an unknown galaxy. [PAWN_nameDef] decided to seek real adventure in a world that had never been imagined.
LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_BWZ.title: <color=#87b4ff>Garden Defender</color>
LanguageData.AF_FerianBackStories_BWZ.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] takes Pride in maintaining regional security and stability!Though often just gawking at the gym, [PAWN_pronoun] occasionally tugs at a colleague's tail to catch a pet climbing a tree, or experiences the thrill of battling an alien race in a virtual world. \n\nAfter the foxes stumbled upon a wormhole that led to an unknown galaxy. [PAWN_nameDef]决定去这全新的世界追求真正的热血。
